network-interface.help: options are ETHERNET, WIFI_ESP8266, MESH_LOWPAN_ND, MESH_THREAD, WIFI_ODIN, WIFI_REALTEK, CELLULAR_UBLOX

default-pin.help: For cellular only, the current value of the SIM PIN as a string; only used if PIN checking is enabled on your SIM (not required by default for a C030 board)

apn.help: For cellular only, the APN string to use for your SIM/network, set to 0 if none (use none for C030)

username.help: For cellular only, the user name string to use for your APN, set to zero if none (use none for C030)

password.help: For cellular only, the password string to use for your APN, set to 0 if none (use none for C030)

deviceId.help: Device name. Only lowercase alphanumeric strings are allowed

deviceKey.help: Symmetric key taken from IoTCentral application for the device
